data.text: Weruru matek gi mor ne Nyasaye mamiyowa teko,
Gouru tung im ka dwe manyien ochakore,
Kane Nyasaye mirima omako gi jo-Misri,
Ne iluongo ka in e chandruok mi akonyi,
“Winjuru wach, yaye joga, to abiro siemou,
Kik ubed gi nyasaye ma wendo e dieru,
An Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasachu, mane ogolou Misri.
Omiyo ne aweyogi nikech chunygi ne tek,
mano kaka dine atieko wasikgi piyo piyo
Joma ochayo Jehova Nyasaye dine okulorene gi luoro,
To un dine apidhou gi ngano maber mogik,
